title: Haunted Soundtrack
description: 13 Tracks & 30 Minutes of Beautiful and Dark Music
longDescription:
Enhance your project with this collection of haunting, somber, and atmospheric music! From melancholy melodies, to ominous ambience, to troubling tension, these tracks were written to create a variety of moods. Whether you're creating a top-down survival game, or a side-scrolling series of puzzles, or a gripping visual novel, I hope these pieces can serve you well.


PREVIEW THE SONGS

https://youtu.be/Add0yR5TNMg


All tracks are loopable. Two of them come with optional intro sections for more build up.
